original_text: And as the lame man which was healed held Peter and John, all the people ran together unto them in the porch that is called Solomon's, greatly wondering.
korean_text: 나은 사람이 베드로와 요한을 붙잡으니 모든 백성이 크게 놀라며 달려 나아가 솔로몬의 행각이라 불리우는 행각에 모이거늘

sentences.original_text: And as the lame man which was healed
all the people ran together unto them
in the porch that is called Solomon's,
